metadata.title: You're On Top (Version 1)

xml.lyrics:
Yes, you're on the top now baby, but don't nothing stay the same
You're on the top now baby, but don't nothing stay the same
Every now and then baby, lady luck deal another hand
You're calling me your pal now, when I used to be your man
Oh, you're calling me your pal now baby, when I used to be your man
Well, you're flying real high now baby, go on and raise your sand
Oh, I realize now baby, that your kind of love wasn't true
Hey, I realize now baby, your kind of love won't do
And what you could have been baby, and all I feel through
(Trying out this banner exchange service)
